property.value: You pay 1 less to play Lokholar for each non-token Horde ally in your party.; At the start of each opponent's turn, Lokholar deals 2 frost damage to each hero and ally in that player's party. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ferocity; Long-range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ferocity; When Morik attacks, each player draws a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blood Elf Hero Required; When you play an ability for the first time on each of your turns, draw a card.; At the end of your turn, if you didn't play an ability this turn, destroy Naolin Sunsurge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Nyn'jah enters play, you may ready target opposing equipment. You control that equipment while Nyn'jah remains in your party.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ferocity; At the end of your turn, if Outrider Zarg dealt no damage this turn, destroy him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protector; When Plagueborn Meatwall defends against an ally, remove all damage from Plagueborn Meatwall, and he deals that much melee damage to each attacking ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Undead heroes and allies in your party can't be destroyed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ra'chee enters play, he heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rexxar enters play, put a unique Bear ally token named Misha with 3 ATK, 3 health, and ferocity into play.; Rexxar has +3 ATK and +3 health while Misha is in your party.

property.value: When Sister Rot enters play, you may destroy target ability.

property.value: Tauren Hero Required; When an opposing ally enters play, exhaust it.

property.value: At the end of each player's turn, if no damage was dealt this turn, Thysta Spiritlasher deals 3 fire damage to that player's hero.

property.value: Troll Hero Required; Protector; Warcaller Zin'bawa has +1 ATK for each damage on allies in your party.

property.name: Rules

property.value: Friendly heros have 1, [Activate] > Put an equipment card from your graveyard into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When King Mukla enters play, you may gain control of target ally with cost 3 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Overseer Oilfist enters play, reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed equipment card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Stitches has +1 ATK and +1 health for each ally card in your graveyard.; When Stitches is dealt damage, remove that many ally cards in your graveyard from the game. Then, remove 1 damage from Stitches for each ally card you removed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Aegis of the Blood God has +1 DEF for each damage on your hero.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Argent Defender becomes exhausted, you may remove target card in a graveyard from the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Belt of the Archmage enters play, reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put all revealed ability cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1, Remove Bracers of the Eclipse from the game > Remove your deck from the game. Shuffle your graveyard face down. It is now your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you play an ability, you may exhaust target armor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of each player's turn, that player destroys one of his abilities, allies, or equipment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy The Immovable Object > Destroy all weapons named The Unstoppable Force.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Activate] > You pay 1 less to play your next ability this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your hero deals combat damage to a hero, that hero's controller discards a card and you draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exhaust one of your armor > Your weapons have +1 ATK this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When an ally is destroyed, your hero deals melee damage equal to that ally's cost to target hero in that ally's party.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you strike with a weapon, your hero has long-range this combat. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player's maximum hand size is reduced by four.; At the start of each player's turn, that player draws cards until he reaches his maximum hand size.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of each player's turn, the first opponent to that player's left names a card. That card can't be played this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1, Destroy Major Healing Potion > Your hero heals 5 damage from itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you complete a quest, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2, Destroy Ramstein's Lightning Bolts > Your hero deals 1 nature damage to each hero and ally.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Druid, Hunter, Paladin, Rogue, Shaman, Warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero can't be destroyed.; While your hero has fatal damage on it, when it's dealt damage, destroy that many of your equipment and/or resources.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of your turn, if you didn't place a resource this turn, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your hero deals shadow damage with an ability to a hero or ally, that character's controller discards a card.; Exhaust your hero > Put a card named Benediction from your graveyard into play.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you strike with Blackcrow, your hero has long-range this combat. (Defenders deal on combat damage to it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you strike with Gurubashi Dwarf Destroyer, your hero has long-range this combat.; 2, Destroy Gurubashi Dwarf Destroyer > Destroy target Dwarf ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Halbred of Smiting enters play, you may destroy target ally with damage on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You pay 3 less to strike with Hellreaver while your hero is defending.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a player draws a card, put 1 damage on that player's hero.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When The Lobotomizer enters play, each player destroys one of his resources.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Staff of Dominance enters play exhausted.; X, [Activate] , Destroy Staff of Dominance > Gain control of target ally with cost X. Use only on your turn.

card.name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you strike with Thunderfury, choose up to five heroes and/or allies. Your hero deals 5, 4, 3, 2, and 1 nature damage to them, respectively.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Touch of Chaos enters play, remove all ability cards in your graveyard from the game.; At the start of your turn, choose at random one of the ability cards you removed this way and put it into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy The Unstoppable Force > Destroy all armor named The Immovable Object.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Will of Arlokk enters play, your hero heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.; 1, Destroy Will of Arlokk > Your hero heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your hero deals combat damage with Zin'rokh, destroy all other abilities, allies, equipment, and resources.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Choose one: Put your hand on the bottom of your deck, then draw that many cards; or draw a card. If your hero is a Night Elf, you may choose both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Choose one: Put an ally from your party into its owner's hand; or draw a card. If your hero is a Draenei, you may choose both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Choose one: Name an ally card, then target player reveals his hand and discards a card with that name; or draw a card. If your hero is a Human, you may choose both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gnome Hero Required; Pay 4 to complete this quest.; Reward: When an opposing non-token ally is destroyed this turn, you may put an ally card from your graveyard into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Choose one: Target ally can't attack this turn; or draw a card. If your hero is a Dwarf, you may choose both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you've completed a quest this turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Choose one: Ready one of your equipment; or draw a card. If your hero is a Gnome, you may choose both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Night Elf Hero Required; During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Ready all allies in your party that haven't attacked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draenei Hero Required; During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Put two Draenei Survivor ally tokens into play with 0 ATK, 1 health, and Exhaust your hero, remove this ally from the game > Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dwarf Hero Required; Pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: If your hero dealt combat damage to an opposing hero this turn, draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Human Hero Required; During your turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.; Reward: Target opponent puts a Gnoll ally token named Hogger with 2 ATK and 2 health into play. When Hogger leaves play, draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blood Elf Hero Required; During your turn, remove a non-token ally in your party from the game and pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Undead Hero Required; Pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Remove an ally card in your graveyard from the game. If you do, draw a card for each ally card you've removed with quests named The Haunted Mills.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Choose one: Target ally has ferocity this turn; or draw a card. If your hero is an Orc, you may choose both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Orc Hero Required; Lazy Peons enters play exhausted.; Exhaust Lazy Peons to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, pay 4 to complete this quest.; Reward: Choose one: If an ally is in your party, each player destroys an ally in his party; or draw a card. If your hero is an Undead, you may choose both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Choose one: Shuffle any number of cards from your graveyard into your deck; or draw a card. If your hero is a Tauren, you may do both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tauren Hero Required; During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Put a Spirit Guide ally token with 1 ATK and 1 health into play. At the start of your next turn, remove that ally from the game. If you do, choose a card from your collection, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 4 to complete this quest.; Reward: Choose one: Put an ability card from your graveyard on top of your deck; or draw a card. If your hero is a Blood Elf, you may choose both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 1 to complete this quest.; Reward: Discard your hand, then draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Choose one: Target player turns one of his quests face down; or draw a card. If your hero is a Troll, you may choose both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Troll Hero Required; During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Target player discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: Remove up to three target cards in one graveyard from the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 1 to complete this quest.; Reward: Look at target player's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an opponent has more resources than you, pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Put the top card of your deck into your resource row face down and exhausted.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 2 to compete this quest.; Reward: Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. If they have different card types, put one into your hand and the other on the bottom of your deck. Otherwise, put both on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Put an ally card with cost 2 or less from your graveyard into play.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put all revealed cards named The Green Hills of Stranglethorn into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exhaust one of your equipment and pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed quest card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
